column3: Are you currently a student or are you employed? (cleaned)
column5: What stage of studying are you in?
column7: How many years of experience do you have?
column8: How big is your company/team (in persons)?
column9: How important is it for you to have a good GUI experience?
column10: How familiar are you with the term User-centred design (UCD) ?
column11: Have you ever worked on GUI projects or have been involved in the design process?
column12: Which devices do you primarily use apps on?
column13: When you download a new app, do you in general feel like it is easy to navigate?
column14: When using an app, how often do you encounter usability problems?
column15: What aspects are most important to you when using an app?
column16: How important is accessibility to you when using an app?
column17: To what extent do you think companies take into the user experience when designing GUI?
column18: When an app changes its design, how does it affect your experience?
column19: Which of the following frustrates you most in an app?
column20: When you encounter a problem in an app, what do you usually do?
column21: Have you ever been asked for feedback on an app?
column22: Do you prefer apps with customization options (themes, layout, font size, etc.)?
column23: Do you feel apps you use are tested thoroughly before release?
column24: How satisfied are you with the overall usability of apps you use?
